phishing_emails.subject: URGENT: Your account will be suspended
phishing_emails.body:
Dear Customer,

Your Netflix account will be suspended in 24 hours due to unusual activity. You must verify your information immediately to avoid losing access.

Click here to verify your account: http://netflix-security-verify.com/login

If you do not verify, your account will be permanently closed.

Regards,
Netflix Security Team
phishing_emails.expected_explanation: Lookalike domain mimicking Netflix, urgency language, requests credential verification

phishing_emails.subject: Security Alert: Unusual sign-in detected
phishing_emails.body:
We detected an unusual sign-in to your account from a new device. If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.

Click here to secure your account: https://bankofamerica-secure.com/identity-verify

Please verify your identity within 1 hour or your account will be locked.

Account: ****1234
Amount at risk: $15,430.00
phishing_emails.expected_explanation: Lookalike domain, urgency, fear tactics, financial bait

phishing_emails.subject: URGENT: Wire transfer needed immediately
phishing_emails.body:
I need you to process an urgent wire transfer right now. I'm in a meeting and can't be reached by phone.

Transfer amount: $45,000
Recipient: ABC Corp
Account: XXXXXXXXXX

This is confidential and urgent. Process immediately without asking questions.

CEO
phishing_emails.expected_explanation: CEO fraud, urgency, unusual request, dangerous attachment with macros

phishing_emails.subject: You have a tax refund of $2,840.00
phishing_emails.body:
Congratulations! You have a tax refund pending.

To claim your refund, you must verify your identity and bank account information.

Refund Amount: $2,840.00
Click here: http://irs-tax-return.gov/claim-refund

This offer expires in 24 hours.

Internal Revenue Service
phishing_emails.expected_explanation: IRS impersonation, fake domain, financial bait, urgency

phishing_emails.subject: Your subscription expires today
phishing_emails.body:
Your Office 365 subscription expires today. All your documents will be inaccessible if you don't renew.

Renew Now: https://microsoft-office365-renewal.com/billing

Don't lose your work - renew immediately.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply.
phishing_emails.expected_explanation: Subscription renewal scam, lookalike domain, urgency

safe_emails.subject: New arrivals you might enjoy
safe_emails.body:
Hi there,

Based on your viewing history, we thought you might enjoy these new arrivals:

- Featured Show 1
- Featured Show 2
- Featured Show 3

Start watching on Netflix.

Your Netflix Team
safe_emails.expected_explanation: Legitimate Netflix domain, no urgency, no sensitive requests

safe_emails.subject: Your Amazon order has shipped
safe_emails.body:
Great news! Your order has shipped and is on its way.

Order Details:
Order #: 112-3456789-0123456
Estimated delivery: March 15-17

Track your package: https://www.amazon.com/progress-tracker

Thanks for shopping with us!
Amazon.com
safe_emails.expected_explanation: Legitimate Amazon domain, order tracking, no urgency

safe_emails.subject: Meeting tomorrow
safe_emails.body:
Hi,

Just confirming our meeting tomorrow at 2pm in Conference Room B.

Agenda:
1. Q1 Review
2. Project updates
3. Next steps

Let me know if you can't make it.

Thanks,
John
safe_emails.expected_explanation: Internal communication, legitimate domain, safe attachment

suspicious_emails.subject: Recent account activity
suspicious_emails.body:
We're writing to let you know about recent activity on your PayPal account.

If you authorized this activity, you can ignore this email.

If you didn't authorize this, please review your recent activity in your account.

Log in to PayPal: https://www.paypal.com

Thank you for being a PayPal customer.
suspicious_emails.expected_explanation: Legitimate domain but generic security message, verify by logging in directly
